title: [GAMEPLAY] Bug with Azir soldier auto-attack.

embed.description: This bug has been around for a long ass time, figured I'd post it up and do all the bugs I can find in 1 big series

body: This Azir bug has existed for a while and is the most frequent one I see.  What happens is occasionally if you command your soldier to auto-attack, Azir goes through the commanding animation but the soldier does not auto-attack.  These "disobedient" soldiers negatively affect Azir's gameplay through either missing CS or damage to an enemy champion.  If I can find a way to reliably reproduce it, I shall edit it in.  It does occur in all of his skins, though.

replies.body: Hey, this should be fixed for next patch. It's a problem where Azir thinks he can attack something because a soldier is near it, but the soldier is busy moving during Q. My bad!
As of patch 5.24 I'm still seeing this bug (although, it did appear to be fixed on the very first day!).  Will this be fixed once more in 5.24?
Glad to hear this.  It's easily his most prevalent bug and it will be much less painful to play him without worrying about soldiers malfunctioning.  Thanks!
